Do you have events once in a while?

You can use MyRsvp to complete your events for free and purchase advanced features only if you really need them from the in-app shop

Coming soon

Monthy subscription

Are you a professional or do you plan big events often?

With a monthly subscription you will be able to use all current basic and professional features and also all future features as we release them

Why? How? What?


Do I need professional features to be able to complete an event?

We developed our service for everyone so you don't have to pay to complete an event with MyRsvp. However, professional features allow you to do more and do it faster.


How do I get professional features?

You can purchase credits from the app "pro features shop" section and use them to unlock the features you need.
You can also gain credits by performing specific tasks.
10 Credits = 1 RM


Which are the professional features?

As of 02/2019 these are the developed features:

- Synced Registration (300Credits)
- Guests Self-Registration (200 Credits)
- Premium invitation card designs (50Credits)
- Upload your own card design (200Credits)
- Add unlimited co-hosts (100Credits)
- Add attendees manually (100Credits)
- Import contacts from Excel (150Credits)
- Export tables and guest lists to pdf (100Credits)
